parameters.query: ={{ `SELECT n.article, n.name, n.category, p.price, p.in_stock, p.product_url, p.updated_at FROM signal23_nomenclature n JOIN signal23_prices p ON p.nomenclature_id = n.id WHERE ${$json.article ? "n.article = '" + $json.article.replace(/'/g, "''") + "'" : "p.product_url LIKE '%" + $json.url.replace(/'/g, "''") + "%'"} LIMIT 1;` }}
